quote: Real talk, your tea recommendation page made me switch to loose-leaf and now I look down on my past self. Oolong supremacy forever!!!
name: Ally Taffet

quote: I found your blog by Googling something about Kurosawa. Stayed for the essay on computer viruses. Still here. Not sure what genre this is. Doesn’t matter. Keep going.
name: Dylan Lewis

quote: I admire the dedication, but holy shit I would not want to be this guy’s roommate.
name: Asa Grant

quote: likes lain? uses arch? valid i guess.
name: Anna Belaraz

quote: I read your “Love Theory” sequence. Still single. 0/10.
name: Asher
